summary: This mod adds around 76 NPCs in skyrim taverns.
descriptionHtml:
=================
ARMY OF FOLLOWERS
=================
by JamezX

Magandang araw sa inyong lahat! (A good day to you all!)

Description:
============
Ever since I've used flexcreator's Mixed Unit Tactics I've wanted to recruit a lot of followers and wage war on bandits,

sorcerers, draugrs and others.Â  But vanilla followers do not respawn when killed. I don't like to make them invulnerable as that

is very unrealistic and not very fun.

Features:
=========
They are Imperials, Nords and Redguards of both genders. Sorry, no Mers, Argonians and Khajiits.
They can be a One-Handed warrior, a Two-Handed Warrior or a Ranger. They scale along the player up to level 80. They are equipped

with either leather or iron armor and armed with iron weapons for starter army. If they die, they respawn again depending on your

respawn settings. When dismissed, they will return to where you found them. They are already grouped into four warriors each,

either a one-handed, two-handed or missile warriors in every tavern in Skyrim.

Installation - Wrye Bash BAIN
=============================
Drop the ArmyofFollowers.esp into your Skyrim Mods\Bash Installers folder, and then activate.


Installation - Manual
=====================
Drop the ArmyofFollowers.esp and graphics folders into your Data folder.
Activate the mod using a mod manager prior to playing Skyrim.


Uninstall
=========
If you used a mod management program, use it to uninstall. Otherwise delete ArmyofFollowers.esp and graphics facegendata files

from the Data folder.


Load Order
==========
Anywhere.

Recommended Mods:
=================

I personally use Mixed Unit Tactics. In fact, this mod is made specifically for it because I love epic warfare with lots of

combatants dishing it out.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30578/?

Extensible Follower Framework
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933/?

Ultimate Follower Overhaul
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037/?

ASIS
Balance with my mod. A lot of NPC enemies, a lot of your ally NPCs, much fun. (But a lot of punishment for your PC.)
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18436/?
